name: u-wave-hub
#devDependencies: Installing @babel/types makes sure the correct version is hoisted up for eslint

scripts.build: npm run --prefix react-server-list build && npm run --prefix client build
scripts.start:client: npm run --prefix react-server-list dev & cross-env HUB_SERVER=https://announce.u-wave.net npm run --prefix client dev
scripts.start: npm run --prefix react-server-list dev & cross-env HUB_SERVER=http://localhost:6451 npm run --prefix client dev & npm run --prefix server dev -- -p 6451
scripts.test: npm run tests-only && npm run lint
